page.title: 16ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: WE WOULD LIKE TO THANK VERY MUCH THE FOLLOWING PEOPLE FOR THEIR HELP IN OUR PROJECT; PAULA JORDAN and HELEN MOONEY FOR PUTTING THE PROJECT ON DISC FOR US. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * SISTER PRISCILLA FOR INFORMATION ON THE CONVENT. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * SISTER CARINA FOR ALLOWING US TO CHECK HER RECORDS. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * REV.TAYLOR WHO KINDLY GAVE PERMISSION TO VISIT ST.JOHN'S CHURCH OF IRELAND. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * REV.FATHER TOAL WHO HELPED US TO COLLECT DATA. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * GABRIEL MALLON FOR ALLOWING US TO USE INFORMATION FROM HIS THESIS. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * :
